content.question: The new physics caused much scientific controversy in the early twentieth century primarily because it

choices.label: led to the use of x-rays for medical diagnosis
inspired the first attempts to build an atomic bomb
placed Germany at the forefront of fundamental scientific research
challenged traditional notions of causality, time, and space
showed that God could not intervene in the universe except spiritually

content.answer: challenged traditional notions of causality, time, and space

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
